resources.string: The application requires the storage permission
Choose a photo from the gallery and crop it directly for your Instagram feed!
Are you sure you want to delete this file?
You are about to download the picture parts in your phone memory
Good ! \nNow just click on the picture part in the order to upload the grid on your Instagram feed !
By accepting, this application will collect bug reports and analytics, all anonymized. This data allows the developer to fix bugs and improve the application.
. Source code available on Github. Feel free to contact me if you encounter any issues while using the app or to send your improvement suggestions.
For this application to work, you need to grant the storage permission
